DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1b Dose Excalation/Expansion : Identify characterize safety tolerability recommend phase 2 dose CP-751,871 administer paclitaxel carboplatin Phase 1b Erlotinib Extension : To characterize safety tolerability CP751,871 administer paclitaxel , carboplatin erlotinib . Phase 2 : To test efficacy CP-751,871 combine paclitaxel carboplatin treatment advance non-small cell lung cancer
DOC.brief_title: Combination Study Of CP-751,871 With Paclitaxel And Carboplatin In Advanced Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis advanced/metastatic lung cancer Previous treatment chemotherapy Uncontrolled diabetes History/active cardiovascular disease
